title: Use formula
text: The word problem implies a direct variation formula with a square is needed. This formula is $$d=k t^2$$.

title: Find values
text: Since the ball falls $$45$$ feet in $$3$$ seconds, we can assign $$d$$ to be $$45$$ and $$t$$ to be $$3$$.

title: Plug in
text: Plug in the values, and solve for k. Then, put the k value into the direct variation equation.
